front.title: Tentative proposal for a Unified User Level Protocol

abstract.t: Now that proposals for expansions to the Telnet Protocol are in vogue again (RFC's 426 and 435, for example), I'd like to promote some discussion of a particular favorite of my own. Please note that this is presented as a tentative proposal: it's an attempt to consider the desirability of a new approach, not a rigorous specification.
